```{r end_point}
# view endpoints for google
httr::oauth_endpoints("google")
```

```{r register_app}
jim_app  <- httr::oauth_app("google",
	key = "",
	secret = ""
)
```

```{r get_token}
google_token  <- oauth2.0(oauth2_endpoints("google"),
													jim_app,
													scope=" hadley uses ..userinfo.profile at 
													googleapis.com ???"
```

```{r write_code}
r  <- GET(xxx,
					config(token = google_token)
					)
```
